flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: A mirror to listen to the music, that connects with your iPhone or iPod. Based on arduino nano and designed for 3d printing let you control the music with gestures. You can skip a song, control the volume, play and pause the music.
guide.title: Interactive Mirror. Control your Ipod with gesture
